alert.note: Alert for Western Grant (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 7:59PM EST until January 27 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations around 1 to 3 inches with storm total accumulation around 2 to 5 inches. Westerly winds will gust around 35 to 40 mph along the ridge tops. * WHERE...Western Grant County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
